name: The Everymovie
description:
A Wario-ware inspired jam submission with movie parody minigames!

It is the year 20XX. Cinemas are dying as technological advances reduce movie attendance to the lowest the world has ever seen. Desperate to save the medium, the industry has banded together to concoct a way to get people into cinemas. Their solution was to create a movie so interesting that the population could not resist: The Everymovie. A film created by combining every movie ever made. However, it will take a skilled projectionist to pull it off...

Controls: WASD and Space

Currently only features 4 minigames due to being a game jam submission.

Credits:

FunkyValentine - Programming, Music, Sprites, Sound Effects, Ideas

ArchaeoAngie - Sound Effects, Sprites, Animations, Ideas

Jess Casey - Sprites, Ideas

Created for the NUCATS Gamejam 2023, with the theme of "A Day At The Movies".
